lines.text:
[to his henchmen]
... don't forget, no matter how foolproof a thing might be, one wrong move might ruin everything, so be on your toes, all of you.

[to the other gang members after Foster has left]
I certainly got to hand it to the boss. The whole thing is foolproof.

[referring to imposter Kit Moyer]
I got a feeling that boy isn't in this alone.
You mean someone else is pulling the strings?
My hunch seems to run that way. At least we're not tipping our hand just yet.
And what's our next move, Hoppy? I'm just itchin' fer action.
Ease down, you old fire-eater. If I'm not far wrong, you'll get plenty of action and soon.
Nuthin' escapes me. I got ears like a mule.
[California realizes he has been insulted and does a double take]
